EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Visit_Confirmation__c.First_Name__c},
We are excited to see you for your visit. Before you come, please complete our online visit confirmation form. This form must be completed prior to your visit.
Click here to confirm your visit: {!Visit_Confirmation__c.URL__c}
Directions to get to this Facility
From the North: Take a left on i-95 and its a straight shot up the parkway. From the South: Take a right on i-95 and its a straight shot up the parkway. Pack light and get ready to Park
